AddExpanded.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item and adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.

AddWithBreak.summary: Adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.

AddWithDelimiter.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item.

GetWithBreak.summary: Adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.

GetWithDelimiter.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item.
